pageContext.claim: “In a certain way, our tremendous Testing success gives the Fake News Media all they want, CASES. In the meantime, Deaths and the all important Mortality Rate goes down. You don't hear about that from the Fake News, and you never will. Anybody need any ventilators???”
pageContext.analysis: A bizarre claim to make as the coronavirus death count continues to increase and as cases spike across the United States. Although deaths continued to climb when Trump tweeted this, the mortality rate did appear to be declining, to around 4 percent as of early July, but the data are imprecise and lag by several weeks.
